song_name: I Was Made For Lovin' You
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, I Was Made For Lovin' You has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: I Was Made For Lovin' You has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Dorian,  and E Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
